discourse_list.title: Lefterisjp - Season 2 Cycle 8 - Delegate communication thread

content.content: Hey all. I am making a topic to cross-post from Twitter my votes for this cycle’s grants votes along with explanation for each one and links to the votes, my explanation and the corresponding committee recommendation. Here it is: https://twitter.com/LefterisJP/status/1590314052655681537
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is explaining their proposal for the Season 2 Cycle 8 Delegate communication thread and providing links to their Twitter account where they have posted their votes for the cycle's grant votes along with explanations for each one. The post may receive constructive criticism or questions from third parties.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
